#summary How to finish the IPT installation
#labels Phase-Deploy

=You have succesfully installed the GBIF Integrated Publishing Toolkit!=

To finish the installation of the tool, you need to perform the following tasks:
  # Log in to your GBIF IPT instance with the administrator account (default u: <em>admin</em> p: <em>admin</em>), go to Admin Settings and fill the information required. Make sure that you click on the _Update Geoserver_ button.
  # Register your IPT instance in the GBIF registry, selecting your <a href="http://www.gbif.org/nodes/nodes">national/regional/thematic GBIF Participant Node</a> using the <a href="admin/configOrg.html">IPT registration feature</a>. You can create a new organisation or select an existing one.
  # Configure your IPT instance description.
  # The IPT supports role based security. Administrators can grant manager roles to registered users who can then manage and publish resources.
